name: Kinslayer
description:
You Are A Vampire

Play as Curien, the disgraced vampire, and use the supernatural abilities of his kind to traverse labyrinthine levels.

Tactical Gameplay

Carefully manage the usage of your abilities. If you run out of Blood points, you will be too tired to use your magic. Killing guards will return some of your expended Blood, but will also slightly increase the Alert level. Don't let your targets know you're coming!

Made By:

Adam Cohen, Jon Grama, Connor Bird, Anthony Zheng
